Package jakarta.nosql.keyvalue

Interface BucketManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    public interface BucketManager
extends AutoCloseable
    Interface used to interact with the persistence context to KeyValueEntity The BucketManager API is used to create and remove persistent KeyValueEntity.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods

      closes a resource

      Finds the Value from a key
      default KeyValuePreparedStatement prepare​(String query)
      Executes a query and returns the result, when the operations are put, remove and get command it will return the result of the operation when the command is either remove or put it will return an empty collection.

        <K,​V> void put​(K key,
                     V value)
        Associates the specified value with the specified key and than storage
        Type Parameters:
        K - the key type
        V - the value type
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        value - the value
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - when either key or value are null

        Parameters:

        Throws:

      • put

        void put​(KeyValueEntity entity,
         Duration ttl)
        Saves the KeyValueEntity with time to live
        Parameters:
        entity - the entity to be insert
        ttl - the defined time to live
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - when entity is null
        UnsupportedOperationException - when expired time is not supported

        Saves the Iterable of keys
        Parameters:
        entities - keys to be insert
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - when the iterable is null

      • put

        void put​(Iterable<KeyValueEntity> entities,
         Duration ttl)
        Saves the Iterable of keys with a defined time to live
        Parameters:
        entities - keys to be insert
        ttl - the time to entity expire
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - when the iterable is null
        UnsupportedOperationException - when expired time is not supported

        Parameters:
        key - the key
        Returns:
        the Optional when is not found will return a Optional.empty()

        Returns:

        Throws:

      • query

        default Stream<Value> query​(String query)
        Executes a query and returns the result, when the operations are put, remove and get command it will return the result of the operation when the command is remove or put it will return an empty collection.
        Parameters:
        query - the query as String
        Returns:
        the result of the operation if delete it will always return an empty list
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - when there is parameter null
        IllegalArgumentException - when the query has value parameters
        IllegalStateException - when there is not KeyValueQueryParser
        QueryException - when there is error in the syntax

      • prepare

        default KeyValuePreparedStatement prepare​(String query)
        Executes a query and returns the result, when the operations are put, remove and get command it will return the result of the operation when the command is either remove or put it will return an empty collection.
        Parameters:
        query - the query as String
        Returns:
        a KeyValuePreparedStatement instance
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - when there is parameter null
        IllegalStateException - when there is not KeyValuePreparedStatement
        QueryException - when there is error in the syntax

      • close

        void close()
        closes a resource
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable
